articles.title: NASA Selects Firefly Aerospace for Artemis Commercial Moon Delivery - NASA

articles.title: Orbiters could find ice on Mars for future human missions - CNN
articles.description: Mars is too cold for liquid water to exist on its surface, but a wealth of ice may exist just beneath the surface in certain regions. Future human missions to Mars could use this ice as a resource and study it to learn about the planet's past.
